titleStmt.title: The praise of our country barly-brake: or, Cupids advisement for young-men to take vp this loving old sport, called barly-brake. To the tune of, When this old cap was new.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Both yong men maids and lads ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
